mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.EMPLOYER as employer, a.RELATIONSHIP_ACCOUNT_HOLDERS as relationshipAccountHolders, a.FAMILY_MEMBERS_COMPANY as familyMembersCompany, a.ACCOUNT_HOLDER_COMPANY_STOCK as accountHolderCompanyStock, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PER_REGULATORY( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , EMPLOYER , RELATIONSHIP_ACCOUNT_HOLDERS , FAMILY_MEMBERS_COMPANY , ACCOUNT_HOLDER_COMPANY_STOCK , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{employer} , #{relationshipAccountHolders} , #{familyMembersCompany} , #{accountHolderCompanyStock} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_REGULATORY SET DEL_FLAG = 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PER_REGULATORY
ID ,
ACCOUNT_ID ,
EMPLOYER ,
RELATIONSHIP_ACCOUNT_HOLDERS ,
FAMILY_MEMBERS_COMPANY ,
ACCOUNT_HOLDER_COMPANY_STOCK ,
CREATED_BY ,
CREATED_DATE ,
UPDATED_BY ,
UPDATED_DATE
#{id} ,
#{accountId} ,
#{employer} ,
#{relationshipAccountHolders} ,
#{familyMembersCompany} ,
#{accountHolderCompanyStock} ,
#{createdBy} ,
#{createdDate} ,
#{updatedBy} ,
#{updatedDate}
mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_REGULATORY
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
EMPLOYER = #{employer} ,
RELATIONSHIP_ACCOUNT_HOLDERS = #{relationshipAccountHolders} ,
FAMILY_MEMBERS_COMPANY = #{familyMembersCompany} ,
ACCOUNT_HOLDER_COMPANY_STOCK = #{accountHolderCompanyStock} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PER_REGULATORY( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , EMPLOYER , RELATIONSHIP_ACCOUNT_HOLDERS , FAMILY_MEMBERS_COMPANY , ACCOUNT_HOLDER_COMPANY_STOCK , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.employer} , #{item.relationshipAccountHolders} , #{item.familyMembersCompany} , #{item.accountHolderCompanyStock} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_REGULATORY SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , EMPLOYER = #{item.employer} , RELATIONSHIP_ACCOUNT_HOLDERS = #{item.relationshipAccountHolders} , FAMILY_MEMBERS_COMPANY = #{item.familyMembersCompany} , ACCOUNT_HOLDER_COMPANY_STOCK = #{item.accountHolderCompanyStock} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_REGULATORY SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , EMPLOYER = #{employer} , RELATIONSHIP_ACCOUNT_HOLDERS = #{relationshipAccountHolders} , FAMILY_MEMBERS_COMPANY = #{familyMembersCompany} , ACCOUNT_HOLDER_COMPANY_STOCK = #{accountHolderCompanyStock} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_PER_REGULATORY a WHERE a.ID = #{id}

SELECT
FROM ACCOUNT_PER_REGULATORY a WHERE a.DEL_FLAG = 0
